subject: Golf
PGA Championship
lead_paragraph: Webb Simpson, a 24-year-old rookie with his first PGA Tour lead, backed up his opening-round 66 with a 68 for a total of 134 and a two-stroke lead over Paul Goydos and Steve Marino.
snippet: Webb Simpson, a 24-year-old rookie with his first PGA Tour lead, backed up his opening-round 66 with a 68 for a total of 134 and a two-stroke lead over Paul Goydos and Steve Marino.
